::Shadow Wing::
She decided that hiding in her chamber would get her no where.  She 
tried to reach out again and make a connection, but this time, she 
was more careful in where she tried to connect to.   She found the 
console screen again and made her words appear on the screen.
"Hello?"
She started to feel something strange. But couldn't make out the 
cause. Then she tried to reastablish all the connections she had made 
earlier, but very carefully and one at a time. She found them all in 
a few short minutes and was once again, moving the protoform's arm 
up. The arm raised straight up into the air and clentched a fist. She 
got excited again. She wasn't able to move the hand like that before 
and was overwhelmingly happy about her achievement.  She tried to 
make the other hand move,  it did, it clenched up as well. She typed 
up the words on the screen,"YAAHHOOOO! I did it! I did it!"

But making the form move was like controling a crane arm.  She was 
controling it, but is didn't feel like it was her arm, or apart of 
her.  More like controling a joy stick which operated the arm.  It 
wasn't apart of her. But if she has some control, then that meant she 
may not be totally helpless after all.  She lowered the arm and tried 
something different.  She tried to raise the head.  It came up about 
two inches off the table, the rested back down.  She didn't want to 
stop. She was like a child with a new toy. She was having fun.
